author: Laura Webb
comment: This is the worst app ever. Upgraded to paid music library but could not pull my 1500 items of music from the free version to the paid. Paid because we wanted to be able to export a CSV file to print and take shopping so we wouldn't buy the same LP twice. Waste of money and the time it took to inventory 1500 LPs and CDs!!

author: Cory Roberts
comment: App is incomplete and appears to be not in active development as the last version was over a year ago. Added one album and photo doesn't show on browse list.
title: Not currently working, no recent updates

author: Nancy Cushing
comment: Very confusing. I want to play free prime music on my Amazon Echo and its not working

reply.author: Andrew Dyer
reply.content: The app does not play music. It simply catalogs your physical record and/or CD collection.

author: notmydivision 43
comment: Can this be used on Windows devices? I would like to be able to sync over several devices, through my Google account. Great little app, dirt simple to use.

author: daniel urrutia
comment: Can't put lyrics n track listing , no barcode scan , no back cover option, no offline editing & update etc...
title: Good intention, needs lot improvement

author: Don Williams
comment: Easy to use.  Everything at a glance.  Bug fixes are better but not perfect yet.
title: Simple and useful

author: Andrew Palmer
comment: Simple but effective, search and add albums to a collection, grouping and album covers.
title: Great for its purpose

author: Marcius Silveira
comment: Smart and easy to use: please add filters/searchs, location, media formats
title: Very good

comment: I can't even listen to music... DO NOT GET THIS APP
title: This sucks

comment: I should be able to put in albums I already bought and listen to them.

reply.author: Andrew Dyer
reply.content: The app doesn't play music. It simply catalogs your physical record and CD collection.

title: Why isn't this working

comment: I can't even find migos bad and boujee
title: it sucks

comment: Sputid epp

author: Todd Allred
comment: Manual but no bells and whistles to get in the way. Needs other music formats though.
title: Like it!

author: Jenn Benn
comment: I'm using for vinyl. Seems that the images it collects are from amazon, so if it's not up there them you don't get an image? It did not find 2/6 album covers i tested. another app that i think uses a different search mechanism did find. Would like to be able to search an artist and add multiple albums rather than searching each. Also would like to be able to make my own personal ratings and sort by that. Thx!
title: Good with room for improvement

author: Joseph Rossi
comment: Doesn't work right I could type in an artist and it doesn't recognize it not worth the download
title: Upset

author: Adam Wright
comment: Out of 10 albums scanned, it found 2.

author: Gary Lee
comment: Great app.  Would like to be able to set vinyl as the default format.
title: Great app.

author: robert Lunde
comment: Worthless

author: Nigel Hundley
comment: Just about the best of it's kind.  Easy to use nice format, editable content list.  You won't want any other after trying this.
title: Music library

author: sam basham
comment: Bought the full version so I could export my library and import it on my new phone. Guess what... it doesn't export\import the pictures. Which is 99% of the whole point. Because 99% of my records are obscure punk rock that aren't found on amazon. Plus taking pictures is buggy and only works half of the time in the first place. What a massive waste of my time this app was.

reply.author: Andrew Dyer
reply.content: The export only contains the data itself since it's spreadsheet based. Use Settings / Backup Data and copy the com.dandydev.medialibraryfree/backup directory from the source device's SD card to the com.dandydev.medialibraryfree directory of the second device's SD card. Finally, choose the Settings / Restore Data menu option on the second device.

title: NOPE

author: M.B.
comment: Works again, but a bit laggy.

author: Xochitl Ratliff
comment: Had this app 1 week. Spent all week adding my collection. Luved it, getting ready to buy pro.  There has already been several updates completly changing everything, BUT THIS LAST UPDATE CAUSED IT TO NO LONGER WORK, Everything disappeared and now it won't work at all. Reinstalled several times and does not work. THIS WAS A BEAUTIFUL APP, now its useless. So glad I did not buy pro
title: Updating My Rating

author: Tristan Gillett
comment: Screw who ever made this app it sucks big balls when I search for a song all it said is no Mach found
title: Hate it

author: Tim Dinsley
comment: In theory this could be a really useful app but in practice it just does not find information for enough of the scanned CD barcodes to make it so
title: A good idea but?

author: Aztec Princess Xochitl
comment: Wonderful so far, can tell this is going to be a fav. Just wish included list of songs on album, but I can manualy do thatl but really cool......
title: Just what I Needed

author: Miles Pettigrew
comment: Only listed 17 LP's then no more!

author: Daniel Decker
comment: I like the app but it doesn't recognize ALOT of titles I put in.
title: Nice app but needs some tweaking

author: Gilbert Soriano
comment: Cumbias
title: Salsa And All Kinds

author: Thomas Haenel
comment: App won't let you import audio files, so it only really works for categorization. Kind of a stupid app, but really just misleading

reply.author: Andrew Dyer
reply.content: The description says it's an app for organizing your vinyl and CD collection. What's misleading about that?

title: Pretty much useless

author: SuperYellow69
comment: U can look up song

author: Sherry Smalley
comment: I'm getting better at understanding it..as time goes on I expect to improve on ratings..
title: Galaxy ace

author: Mick Jackson
comment: Nice quick entry, if the artist is recognised, but somehow needs more than just the basic info and cover picture, the track listings at the very least without running off to Amazon for a shopping page. Nicely laid out, fast, works.
title: Too simple for what I want really

author: Lou D'Amico
comment: Just started using the app. My vinyl shelf is getting out of hand and this is helping me fill the gaps is my collection, without duplicates, on the go.  I would give it 5 stars if there was an option for sorting via release date and record label. An option for creating you're sorting category would also be useful.  Overall, I would recommend this app. Keep up the good work.
title: New user

author: Alan Hyde
comment: Really wanted this to be good but it's only found 2 of the 20 CDs I've scanned so far (all of them on Amazon) and the bulk load failed but doesn't say why. I have too many CDs to type them all in manually. Would be good if you could select an artist and choose multiple albums. Even failed to find Dark Side of the Moon, I mean come on!
title: Shame

author: Francis Augustine
comment: It doesn't recognise most of my "mainstream" records. I ended up spending a long time manually entering the likes of Celine Dion and 30 Seconds Mars. Then I realised that you can only sort it by entry date or alphabetically (artist-album). Search feature not great. There are many apps that offer more potential. Just that I find they ALL don't do a good enough job.
title: Manual entry and no search ability

author: jerry adams
comment: This is exactly what i was lookig for. Im hoping adding lost album covers works as good as everything else. Makes it easy in a store when trying to remember obscure albums i already own.
title: Works and is great

author: Cephas Atheos
comment: Probably OK if you want to look at your recording data. But there's no way to just browse a folder containing tracks- you have to put them in a spreadsheet. Very basic app, not useful for existing libraries without a HUGE amount of manual typing.
title: Can only list music titles. No searching for existing files.

author: Ira Elting
comment: Thanks for putting this app together...Im glad someone did! I have just under 2000 lp's, and I was hoping someone would do this. I put in only about 54 albums so far, got a long way to go! Thanks again.
title: Great app!

author: Robert Ellis
comment: With my large music collection this helps prevent second guessing  if I already own an album
title: Great app

author: Andrew Stephan
comment: I love the fact I can take a picture of the album cover if none other are available.
title: Great app
